samples.name: Default Functionalities
samples.description: The sample demonstrates about default functionalities of the Tab component (also known as Tabbed UI) which is navigation component.

samples.name: Orientation
samples.description: The sample demonstrates how to customize the orientation of Tab component along with feasibility to customize the Tab header styles.

samples.name: Responsive Modes
samples.description: The sample illustrates that responsive mode of Tab component that aligns tab items in a  scrollable or popup mode if there is no enough space.

samples.name: Wizard
samples.description: This sample demonstrates how to design a wizard-like application with the sequential action using the Tab component. For example, a train reservation system.
